title: Patch 6.22 Ingame problem

embed.description: Upload and share videos instantly. It's free and simple. No signup required.

body: When i start a game , my sreen start flashing and its totaly unplayable.

replies.body: My eyes!!!  I'm seeing red!  You might be having a graphics drive or card problem.  I'd still recommend using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help rule out possibilities like outdated drivers.  Hope that helps....and get some sun glasses.  X___X
